io.requery

Interface Transactionable<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - optional return type for runInTransaction(Callable, TransactionIsolation)
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockingEntityStore<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityDataStore

    public interface Transactionable<R>
    Defines an interface for objects that provide a transaction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <V> R runInTransaction(Callable<V> callable)
      Runs the given callable in a transaction.
      <V> R runInTransaction(Callable<V> callable, TransactionIsolation isolation)
      Runs the given callable in a transaction.
      Transaction transaction() 

    • Method Detail

      • transaction

        Transaction transaction()
        Returns:
        the current transaction

      • runInTransaction

        <V> R runInTransaction(Callable<V> callable)
        Runs the given callable in a transaction. The transaction will be automatically committed after successful completion of the callable. If the callable throws an exception the transaction will be rolled back.
        Type Parameters:
        V - call result type
        Parameters:
        callable - to run
        Returns:
        callable result

      • runInTransaction

        <V> R runInTransaction(Callable<V> callable,
                       TransactionIsolation isolation)
        Runs the given callable in a transaction. The transaction will be automatically committed after successful completion of the callable. If the callable throws an exception the transaction will be rolled back.
        Type Parameters:
        V - call result type
        Parameters:
        callable - to run
        isolation - isolation level for the transaction
        Returns:
        callable result
